name: Daisy Dangerous
description:
Daisy is in a quest to rid the land of the invading alien sentient machines. Guide her across the multiple traps laid out along the way to reach the machine overlord, defeat it and end the invasion.

THIS IS A GAMEJAM BUILD! IT HAS MANY MANY BUGS! PLEASE BE PATIENT ABOUT THOSE... I'LL TRY TO FIX THEM WHENEVER I CAN.

Controls

AWSD/Arrow Keys/D-Pad/Left Analog Stick: move left or right, duck or climb stairs

J/X/Enter/XBox X: Fire

Down + Fire: Drop a bomb

Space/K/Xbox A: Jump

Credits

This game's assets are entirely made by myself but it uses one font that I've made previously for other projects. If you want to check out my other projects, go to https://securas.itch.io/ or check out my twitter feed @Securas2010. Every now and then, I'll drop some stuff on my Youtube Channel. But that's unfortunately not very frequent.

Some of the base mechanics of this game are based on one of my all time favorite games: Rick Dangerous. Of course, I've modified them to enhance the action component rather than the puzzle component, as was the case of the original. I hope that you enjoy it and PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT BELOW. It really helps me improve the game and perhaps learn new things.

The game was built using the shiny brand new  Godot Engine and I would like to acknowledge the constant support of the Godot community.
